mapper.update:
update t_match_info
match_name = #{matchName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
img_id = #{imgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description_id = #{descriptionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ticket_type = #{ticketType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ticket_name = #{ticketName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
win_value = #{winValue,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=BIT},
give_chance = #{giveChance,jdbcType=INTEGER},
consume_amount = #{consumeAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where mark_id = #{markId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_match_info set match_name = #{matchName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, img_id = #{imgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description_id = #{descriptionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ticket_type = #{ticketType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ticket_name = #{ticketName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, win_value = #{winValue,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, give_chance = #{giveChance,jdbcType=INTEGER}, consume_amount = #{consumeAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, where mark_id = #{markId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT mark_id AS markId, match_name as matchName, start_time as startTime, end_time As endTime, give_chance AS giveChance, (select i.image_path from db_base.t_image_info i where i.mark_id = img_id) as imgPath, (select i.image_path from db_base.t_image_info i where i.mark_id = description_id) as descriptionPath FROM t_match_info WHERE status = 1 AND start_time < NOW() AND end_time > NOW()

SELECT
FROM t_match_info WHERE status = 1 AND start_time < NOW() AND end_time > NOW() AND mark_id = #{markId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
